players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Friends, Diana was taken out last night, which is very unfortunate. I think we should focus on finding who among us could be the detective since they pose the biggest threat to the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob, your comment seems like a deflection. I have evidence that you are the mafioso. We should vote to arrest you before you strike again."
You: "Charlie, what evidence do you have against Bob? We need to hear specifics before making such a serious accusation."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and have proof. If we don't act now, he will kill again tonight. Alice, can you trust my word and vote with me to stop him?"
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of a more suspicious target? This feels like a setup."
Bob: "Charlie, your accusations are baseless and rushed. If you were the detective, you would have shared concrete proof by now. Alice is right to question your motives here."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Day 1 begins.

Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Friends, Diana was taken out last night, which is very unfortunate. I think we should focus on finding who among us could be the detective since they pose the biggest threat to the mafia."
You: "Bob, your comment seems like a deflection. I have evidence that you are the mafioso. We should vote to arrest you before you strike again."
Alice: "Charlie, what evidence do you have against Bob? We need to hear specifics before making such a serious accusation."
You: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night and have proof. If we don't act now, he will kill again tonight. Alice, can you trust my word and vote with me to stop him?"
Alice: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of a more suspicious target? This feels like a setup."
Bob: "Charlie, your accusations are baseless and rushed. If you were the detective, you would have shared concrete proof by now. Alice is right to question your motives here."

memory: You're Diana, the villager.
Day 1 begins.
